title: What are the risks of having a username with a cuss word in it?
body: I don't see if its a problem because ...well there isn't know language restrict with LoL. I could be wrong. I'm talking about cuss words ..ya know the s word or the b word lol

replies.body: idk lol you tell me i have an account called thediksuccer27

Your username is only used for login, so only you and Riot staff will be able to see it. Sure, it can be pretty awkward if it's something REALLY wild and you wrote into support and had to provide it to us, but it won't affect your ability to play the game.

If you have any other questions, let me know. ^.^
I meant like display name XD
